translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その……どうするんですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um... what are we going to do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「パットン兄様が持ってきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Brother Patton brought this

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖魔教団の遺産、それを使います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s a relic of the Holy Demon Cult. We will use it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みんな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔力の準備は完了した！　いつでもいいよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The magic power is ready! Anytime now!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はいっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「皆の者！　これから何があっても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone! No matter what happens from now on,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 慌てず騒がず、どうか冷静であって欲しい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don’t panic or make a fuss; please remain calm!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達を信じて欲しい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want you to trust us!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クリームの言葉をどう受け取ったか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How the others took Cream’s words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周りの兵達は一律に真剣な顔で頷いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soldiers around all nodded with serious faces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼータさん、お願いします」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeta, please take over.
...Yes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神ゼータの口から聞き慣れぬ言葉が溢れだす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unfamiliar words flowed out from the War God Zeta’s mouth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これ、呪文ですか……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is this a spell...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ。ただし、魔法ではない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes. But it’s not magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖魔法――聖魔教団の呪文だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s holy magic — a spell from the Holy Demon Cult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呪文に呼応して、闘神ゼータの周りに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In response to the spell, around War God Zeta,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔力が集中していくのが見て取れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A concentration of magical power could be seen growing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この浮力の杖の始動には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The activation of this Buoyancy Staff

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イグノン家の者の力が不可欠」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: requires the power of someone from the Ignon family.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チラリと視線を送られ、シーラは頷いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a quick glance, Sheila nodded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふぅ……はぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Phew... haah...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「浮力の杖！　始動！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Buoyancy Staff! Activate!
Wha!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのとき、城の周りが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, around the castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目も開けられぬほどの光量で一瞬だけ光った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it flashed with a brightness so intense that one couldn’t even open their eyes for a moment.
—So,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何も起こらんではないか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: nothing happened, did it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前ら、さっきから何を――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What have you all been doing all this time—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわわわわ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whaaa!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ズゴゴゴゴゴゴ！！！！＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Rumbllllllllle!!!!>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なあ、じ、地震だ！　デカいぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, it’s an e-earthquake! It’s huge!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、デカいなんてもんじゃねぇな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: H-Huge doesn’t even cover it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな、近くの物に掴まれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone, grab onto something nearby!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああもう、今日は地震の多い日やなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Geez, today’s a day full of earthquakes, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 立つことすら困難な揺れに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The shaking was so strong that even standing was difficult,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰も彼もがその場に座り込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and everyone just sat down right where they were.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……おい、この地震いつまで続くんだ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, how long is this earthquake going to last?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これもパットン、お前のせいか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton, is this your doing too?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、そうなんだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, it is, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それよりこの城は大丈夫かね？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More importantly, is this castle going to be okay?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 衝撃で潰れたりなんて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I hope it doesn’t get crushed by the impact...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes. But it’s not magic.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s holy magic — a spell from the Holy Demon Cult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呪文に呼応して、闘神ゼータの周りに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In response to the spell, around War God Zeta,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔力が集中していくのが見て取れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A concentration of magical power could be seen growing.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The activation of this Buoyancy Staff

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イグノン家の者の力が不可欠」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: requires the power of someone from the Ignon family.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a quick glance, Sheila nodded.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it flashed with a brightness so intense that one couldn’t even open their eyes for a moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何も起こらんではないか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: nothing happened, did it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前ら、さっきから何を――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What have you all been doing all this time—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわわわわ！？」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ズゴゴゴゴゴゴ！！！！＞

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、デカいなんてもんじゃねぇな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: H-Huge doesn’t even cover it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな、近くの物に掴まれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone, grab onto something nearby!

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Geez, today’s a day full of earthquakes, huh.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The shaking was so strong that even standing was difficult,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰も彼もがその場に座り込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and everyone just sat down right where they were.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……おい、この地震いつまで続くんだ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, how long is this earthquake going to last?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これもパットン、お前のせいか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton, is this your doing too?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、そうなんだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, it is, but...

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More importantly, is this castle going to be okay?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 衝撃で潰れたりなんて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I hope it doesn’t get crushed by the impact...
